### Hello,
I am an Assistant Professor in [Psychology](https://www.csudh.edu/psychology/) at [California State University, Dominguez Hills](https://www.csudh.edu/). I previously taught at the [University of Minnesota](https://www.cehd.umn.edu/edpsych/) and  [UCLA](https://www.psych.ucla.edu/).

I'm an interdisciplinary cognitive scientist interested in how people learn and think about math and science. I love to teach and discuss cognition, statistics, computing, and research methods. I'm also passionate about open, inclusive science and making science communication more transparent, effective, and human.


::: {.activities}

::: {.interests-col-6}
## Interests

* Math Learning
* Mathematical Cognition
* Statistical Thinking
* Open Science
* Science Communication
* Computational Thinking
* Data Literacy
* Causal Inference
